body_content.explanation: a person who climbs mountains as a sport:
examples: Her son became an extreme skier, a rock climber and a mountain climber.

body_content.explanation: a person who is good at riding a bicycle up mountains:
examples: He is regarded as the finest mountain climber cycling has seen in a generation.

body_content.explanation: an exercise in which you start with your hands and feet on the floor and your legs stretched out, and then bring each leg in turn up towards your chest:
examples: Doing a set of mountain climbers should get your heart rate up and burn fat too.
